website_summaries.verdict: Sizing tends to run on the smaller side, but the proportions on this satin pajama set are generous. A wide assortment of colors is available.
pros: Comfortable satin material smooth on outside, soft on inside
Big and tall users report a good fit
cons: Fabric dye can bleed into sheets and blankets
Satin material is very thin, does not breath well
No fly, just an elastic waistband

customer_reviews.title: Feel and look nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am raising my daughters right; they like to shop on Amazon too! My daughter picked these out for her dad for Christmas. I was a little afraid for the price that they might fall apart after a few washings, but 2 months of frequent wear and frequent washings and they are holding up great. They look and feel nice. We all like to cuddle up to Daddy when he is wearing them! Turns out my daughter made a great selection!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: They look so good on him and are reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these PJ's. They look so good on him and are reasonably priced. Great for summer nights. I would have given them 5 stars but I purchased them in black and the color bled through so badly that we had to throw them away. My good sheets were ruined. But, he liked them so well that he asked me to order them in another color. So I ordered the grey and blue ones and they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: strawberry7

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fabric. Beware that nails or machine wash can ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fabric. Beware that nails or machine wash can scratch it. The color drops seriously. I went to bed in it for three days and the sheet got painted purple on the spot of my back. So just wear it walking around the house but change it before sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! Must handwash.
customer_reviews.text: After having zero luck finding a his/her satin PJ set, I got these for my husband to match mine (same brand in women's, black with light brown/gold-ish flowers) and it was perfect! They fit very well. I hand wash both of them pretty often (after 3-4 wears) in warm water and just a little laundry soap (yes the water is murky most prominently after the first wash but it's improved with each subsequent wash. ) These pjs are black so of course the color will bleed out into the water! There has been no obvious fade after 4 washes. I have observed no mistakes in the stitching. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nims

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find this type of Pajama set in larger sizes at a reasonable price. Love the satin finish too. Makes turning in bed easy. I have laundered them already, on the delicate setting and as light weight as they are, they air dried very quickly. Over the next months I plan to buy a few more sets. Very cool to sleep in as I am very hot nature'ed. I have another set from different store that are very thin and almost transparent and would be for sleeping only . This fabric is just right for family lounging before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it. For tall and big people
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. For tall and big people, I recommend xl instead of l. The sizes are not huge.
customer_reviews.author: Sahane

customer_reviews.title: 100% Polyester not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s titled as Satin high quality, so you may bypass the material description but that says high quality Polyester Satin feel. Not true it looks and feels like %100 polyester the outside may be shiny but the inside feels so ruff and hard. I’m so disappointed for almost $30 you should be able to get real satin/silk PJ. they should be more Honest in their description, lower their price and maybe I would not have felt deceived.
customer_reviews.author: Fatimeh Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Nice, long and stanky
customer_reviews.text: The top fit great but for me the pants are too long. The waist is just fine. I have about a 31" waist and inseam. The worst part though is the smell! They smell horrible of something like factory machines or something. I ended up washing them twice in a machine which is advised against but there is no way I could put up with the smell otherwise. I can still smell it but I try to mask it with cologne. They did survive machine washing and drying just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Speck

customer_reviews.title: They were great, but the dye runs.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I really loved these pajamas. They are comfortable, look great, and fit perfectly. Many people complained about having buttons on the “women’s side”, which I think is absurd and it didn’t bother me a bit. The one drawback on them is a big one. Even after months of having them and multiple washes, they still stain sheets. The dye has continued to run from them after no less than 10 washes. This is a major downside and because of this, I will be getting rid of them. They have ruined a set of nice white sheets. Perhaps I will get something similar down the road in a colour that will not run.
customer_reviews.author: MParks_Photo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and slow to ship
customer_reviews.text: First problem was they it took forever to ship. I purchased on a Tuesday, and I wasn't charged/it didn't ship until the NEXT Thursday. This is a store in the states and fulfillment handled by Amazon, I don't understand the delay. Second problem is poor quality. I read reviews that the dye on darker colors bleeds onto sheets and other cloth so I ordered Silver. They look and feel great, but I noticed the hem on the sleeves coming apart before they've ever been washed. I'm extremely nervous about putting them in the wash, and extremely disappointed in the quality given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Bless through. Ruins bedding. DO NOT BUY.

All in all these pajamas bled through over $300 worth of materials. Absolutely won't be buying anything further from them, especially with NO ability to contact the seller with complaints. I'm appalled and disgusted. DO NOT buy these if you value anything you owe.

product_meta.title: Tony & Candice Men's Classic Satin Pajama Set Sleepwear
feature_bullets: High Quality Satin Poly Men's Pajama Set
Nicely tailored Satin Pajama Set with one front pocket on chest
Light weight material with silky feel for comfy night sleep. Great gift for family or friend.

New dark colored fabric will lose floating color from its surface, especially black. We suggest you wash your new satin products before wearing. If possible, please use neutral detergent to wash, soap or alkaline detergent may increase fading. Wash separately or with like color, wash inside out can help protect fabric color. Hand wash below 30 Celsius Degree. Iron on low heat.

For the sleepwear size guide, please scroll down to Product Description. Please do not only compare the size title (S/M/ L/ XL) with your usual clothing, please read carefully each element of the size guide (bust, waist, length, etc.).
